infos.value: Hey, did you hear? It seems that dumb broad is traveling with us.
Adelard's sister... If I remember correctly, her name is Salire.
I guess he thought it was too dangerous to leave her behind in Hourne.
The brother is just as dumb as the sister.
Let's deal with those two during this expedition to the western fortress. We'll get Glahz reinstated as commander.
Aye, then I can go back to lining my pockets without all the toil and trouble.
Let's recapture the fortress first. Then we'll catch them when they're off guard.
Even so... I wonder, do they really think they can deal with us so easily?
